alert.note: Alert for Clay; East Becker; West Becker (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Clay and central Becker Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 441 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Many Point Lake to Averill. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Detroit Lakes, Hawley, Lake Park, Toad Lake, Height Of Land Lake, Callaway and Hitterdal. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
